title: New: Sega Bodega – Konerak
body:
It’s only bloody Valentine’s Day! And what better way to celebrate the occasion than with this colourful little gen from Glasgow based producer, **[Sega Bodega](https://www.facebook.com/segabodega)**. Starting off as a centred slow burner, his new track, _Konerak_, shyly erupts to form a manic and dizzying set of sounds. Definitely one to watch.

**Sega Bodega** will release his EP 34 on 1st April, via Week Of Wonders.
